name: MARIO (nurulafini)
description:
MARIO, inspired by Super Mario Bross, is a boy who likes skateboarding but there's some bizarre enemy called Gomba that ruined his path. With this simple offline endless game, you can help MARIO to achives a high score and defeats Gomba to charge your bored day.

Developers :

  • Andia Enggar Mayasari
  • Aprilita Dina Kumala
  • Nurul Afini
  • Umi Anisah
